name: Blocky Dash
description:
Install instructions

For Windows:

1. Download the zip file

2. Extract BlockyDash1.0.0.0.zip

3. Open Blocky Dash.exe

For Mac:

For Linux:

1. Download the tar.gz file

2. Extract BlockyDash1.0.0.0.tar.gz

3. If you are running on a 64-bit version of Linux, run Blocky Dash.x86_64. Otherwise, run Blocky Dash.x86
